titleStmt.title: The unreasonableness of the Romanists, requiring our communion with present Romish church, or, A discourse drawn from the perplexity and uncertainty of the principles, and from the contradictions betwixt the prayers and doctrine of the present Romish church to prove that 'tis unreasonable to require us to joyn in commmunion with it.
titleStmt.author: Squire, William, d. 1677.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.R. for Richard Royston,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Attributed to Willian Squire. cf. BM.
